button.class: btn btn-outline-primary bg-white o_add_wishlist o_add_wishlist_dyn ian-product-card__wishlist
button.title: Add to Wishlist

del.t-attf-class: ian-product-card__old-price ml-1 h6 {{'' if combination_info['has_discounted_price'] else 'd-none'}}

div.class: css_quantity quantity input-group d-inline-flex mr-2 my-1 align-middle

a.class: btn btn-primary js_add_cart_json ian-popup__counter-btn btn btn-minus btn-number
a.title: Remove one

a.class: btn btn-primary float_left js_add_cart_json ian-popup__counter-btn btn-plus btn-number
a.title: Add one

a.style: width:75%; height:50px; border-radius:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; align-items:center;

a.class: ian-btn--link ian-btn--view-detail py-3 text-center text-white d-block

div.p: Looking for support? Don't worry, We've got your back!

div.h2:

a.class: small ia-link ia-white--link text-center mt-2 d-block
